=How To Embed/Install COLLADA Web Viewer=

==Download necessary files==

You need to have the appropriate O3D libraries downloaded and unpacked on your site.
O3D download:



Also you must download and unpack the COLLADA Web Viewer on your site. 

Option 1: COLLADA Web Viewer release Download:

*The extra directory is only optional and doesn't need to be uploaded.

Option 2: Check out from source:
git clone git://gitorious.org/collada-web-viewer/master.git master
and copy the COLLADA Web Viewer directory to the server.
